languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки — и вы чувствуете, как ваше сердце начинает биться в два раза быстрее, а от резкого прилива крови к голове у вас мутится перед глазами.{/n} "Ты только что свел{mf||а} на нет все те жертвы, которые могли бы быть оправданы результатами этой миссии!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки — и вы чувствуете, как ваше сердце начинает биться в два раза быстрее, а от резкого прилива крови к голове у вас мутится перед глазами.{/n} "Ты только что свел{mf||а} на нет все те жертвы, которые могли бы быть оправданы результатами этой миссии!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс сжимает кулаки — и вы чувствуете, как ваше сердце начинает биться в два раза быстрее, а от резкого прилива крови к голове у вас мутится перед глазами.{/n} "Ты только что свел{mf||а} на нет все те жертвы, которые могли бы быть оправданы результатами этой миссии!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希握紧了拳头。你感觉到你的心脏开始以两倍的速度狂跳，血液猛地涌上了你的头部，你的视线变得模糊起来。{/n}“这次任务的成果，本可以让所有的牺牲都变得有意义，可你却让这一切都白费了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希握紧了拳头。你感觉到你的心脏开始以两倍的速度狂跳，血液猛地涌上了你的头部，你的视线变得模糊起来。{/n}“这次任务的成果，本可以让所有的牺牲都变得有意义，可你却让这一切都白费了！”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños y sientes que se te acelera el corazón. La riada de sangre que fluye por tu cabeza hace que tu visión se vuelva borrosa.{/n} «Los resultados de esta misión podrían haber dado sentido a todas esas muertes, ¡pero acaba de volverlas inútiles!».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix aprieta los puños y sientes que se te acelera el corazón. La riada de sangre que fluye por tu cabeza hace que tu visión se vuelva borrosa.{/n} «Los resultados de esta misión podrían haber dado sentido a todas esas muertes, ¡pero acaba de volverlas inútiles!».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスが拳を握りしめ、あなたは己の心臓の鼓動が倍2速くなるのを感じる。そして頭に突然血が上ったかと思うと、視界がぼやけた。{/n}「この作戦の結果、すべての死が意味のあるものになったかもしれませんね。だが、陛下がそれを無にしたのです！」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスが拳を握りしめ、あなたは己の心臓の鼓動が倍2速くなるのを感じる。そして頭に突然血が上ったかと思うと、視界がぼやけた。{/n}「この作戦の結果、すべての死が意味のあるものになったかもしれませんね。だが、陛下がそれを無にしたのです！」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ballt die Fäuste – du spürst, wie dein Herz doppelt so schnell schlägt, und der plötzliche Blutfluss zum Gehirn vernebelt deinen klaren Blick.{/n} "Das Resultat dieser Mission hätte all diesen Todesfällen Bedeutung verliehen, aber Ihr habt sie soeben wertlos gemacht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ballt die Fäuste – du spürst, wie dein Herz doppelt so schnell schlägt, und der plötzliche Blutfluss zum Gehirn vernebelt deinen klaren Blick.{/n} "Das Resultat dieser Mission hätte all diesen Todesfällen Bedeutung verliehen, aber Ihr habt sie soeben wertlos gemacht!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix serre les poings. À ce moment, vous sentez votre cœur s'emballer, et l'afflux soudain de sang dans votre tête brouille votre vision.{/n} « Nous aurions pu donner un sens à ce massacre en menant ma mission à bien, mais à cause de vous, tous ces gens sont morts pour rien ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix serre les poings. À ce moment, vous sentez votre cœur s'emballer, et l'afflux soudain de sang dans votre tête brouille votre vision.{/n} « Nous aurions pu donner un sens à ce massacre en menant ma mission à bien, mais à cause de vous, tous ces gens sont morts pour rien ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix yumruklarını sıkıyor. O sırada nabzının iki katına çıktığını hissediyorsun. Beynine hücum eden kanla görüşün bulanıklaşıyor.{/n} "Bu vazifeyi sonuçlandırabilseydik ölenlerin fedakârlıkları nafile olmayacaktı. Ama sayende her şey boşa gitti!"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix clenches his fists — and you feel your heart begin to beat twice as fast, and the sudden rush of blood to your head causes your vision to blur.{/n} "The results of this mission could have made all those deaths mean something, but you just rendered them worthless!"

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
